Class CollectionComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>

  • public class CollectionComponent
extends ItemCache<com.lucidworks.apollo.common.models.Collection>
    Does basic data reading involving collections. Caches the results internally.

      • getTotalCollectionCount

        public int getTotalCollectionCount()
                            throws SolrAPIException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        This returns the number of collections *that are registered in Apollo.*. Not the total number of collections in all the Solr instances Apollo knows about.

        Get the app name (or more correctly the ID) that a collection is associated with, if possible. Here because I couldn't think of a better place for it. If you can, feel free to move it.
